page.title: 12Shopping in Cheshunt
page.content: There is an abundance of small shops in this area, although recently larger shopping complexes have been developed.A general criticism of the shopping facilities is the lack of variety whilst some people complain about the prices charged at their local shops.Dominating the area is the new Tescos complex.This was built two years ago and amongst the many facilities offered are a cafe,flower shop and a free bus service.This has resulted in an influx of people travelling in from Enfield, Hertford, Waltham Cross and Waltham Abbey.The presence London, only ten miles away, means that much shopping is done on a commuting basis with many families returning to their original community.
